SBuffer
struct
SBuffer

Defines a buffer (which may be either a constant buffer or and unordered access buffer used by a compute shader).

Members
m_spBuffer

the D3D buffer (that will be passed to the compute shader)

m_spStagingBuffer

staging buffer for going between CPU and GPU

m_spView

A view onto the buffer m_spBuffer

m_bufferSize

size of buffer in bytes

m_heapSize

size of the total heap the buffer is contained in

Module

{Link:import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;{Rendering/Caustic/Shader.ixx}}
